name: Prevail Ventures
tag_list: venture-capital, fund-raising, sales-strategies, business-plans, growth-strategies, mergers-acquistions, exits, product-roadmaps, advisor, raising-venture-capital
overview:
Prevail Ventures offers boutique advisory services early to mid stage technology companies through the formative challenges of; business strategy and modeling, raising capital, sales and growth strategies, developing operating plans, product roadmaps and launches, and evaluating mergers/acquisitions and exits.

We maintain relationships with 50+ Venture Capital firms across the US (primarily Silicon Valley) keeping abreast of each firms and partners investment criteria and preferences, domain expertise, and status/stage of funds.
